avalancheActivity.comment: The older wind slabs are to be found in particular adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls. Especially on wind-loaded slopes more small and, in isolated cases, medium-sized avalanches are possible. Avalanches can be released, mostly by large loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The wind slabs are clearly recognisable. They represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment: In some places wind slabs are lying on the smooth surface of an old snowpack. Weak layers exist in the snowpack.

tendency.comment:
In some localities snowfall.
As a consequence of snowfall and the southwesterly wind, fresh snow drift accumulations will form.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The older wind slabs are to be found in particular adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls. In particular on very steep slopes more mostly small avalanches are possible.
Avalanches can be released, mostly by large loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The wind slabs are clearly recognisable. They represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The meteorological conditions facilitated a strengthening of the snowpack.
Below approximately 1500 m only a little snow is lying.

tendency.comment:
In some localities snowfall.
As a consequence of snowfall and the southwesterly wind, fresh snow drift accumulations will form.
